Address.Address1: Arena Gorda, Macao-Higuey Provincia la Altagracia

Description.Text: Location The hotel is located on the east coast of the Dominican Republic, in Arena Gorda (Playa Bavaro), next to the beautiful beach of Macao. The hotel is only 30 kilometres from Punta Cana International Airport, 1 hour from La Romana International Airport and 3.5 hours from Las Americas International Airport (Santo Domingo). Facilities The complex comprises a total of 597 accommodation units. A lobby and a reception are available to guests. The upper floors can be reached by lift. Internet access (for a fee) and wireless internet access (for a fee) are available in the public areas. Gastronomic options include a restaurant and a bar. Shopping facilities are available. The grounds of the complex feature a playground and an attractive garden. Among the additional services available are a babysitting service, medical assistance, room service and a laundry. A conference area with a conference room and a business centre is available. Rooms All accommodation units feature air conditioning, a fan, a living room, a kitchen and a bathroom. Most rooms additionally feature a balcony or a terrace. Many of the rooms also offer a sea view, adding to the ambience. Each accommodation unit features separate bedrooms, a queen-size bed or a king-size bed. A safe, a minibar and a desk also feature. The accommodation units offer a range of amenities, including tea and coffee making equipment. An ironing set is also available to guests. Each accommodation unit offers internet access, a telephone, a TV, a radio, a DVD player and wireless internet access. Guests will also find slippers provided. Amenities in the bathrooms include a shower, a bathtub and a spa bath. The bathroom additionally offers a hairdryer, a vanity mirror and bathrobes. Sports/Entertainment The complex features an outdoor pool and a children's pool. A waterslide provides fun for all ages. Sun loungers and parasols offer the ideal way to unwind. A hot tub provides an opportunity for relaxation. There is also a poolside snack bar. The complex offers outdoor sporting options, including tennis, beach volleyball, basketball, crazy golf and golf, or for a fee, horse riding. Guests of the complex have a wide range of watersports to choose from, including windsurfing, sailing, kayaking, snorkelling, diving and aquafit, or for a fee, water skiing. The complex also offers sports enthusiasts a wide range of indoor facilities and activities, including a gym, table tennis, pool/billiards, darts and yoga. The complex offers various wellness options, including a sauna, a beauty salon and massage treatments, or for a fee, a spa and a hammam. An entertainment programme, an entertainment programme for adults, a disco, a kids' club and a casino provide guests with recreational options during their free time. Meals The complex offers a wide range of bookable meals and board options, including breakfast, lunch, dinner, full board and All-inclusive. The complex additionally offers snacks. Both alcohol-free drinks and alcoholic drinks are available to guests.

The complex offers a wide range of bookable meals and board options, including breakfast, lunch, dinner, full board and All-inclusive. The complex additionally offers snacks. Both alcohol-free drinks and alcoholic drinks are available to guests.
*Please be advised there is a fee for early dapartures.* *Elegance Club & Club Room types are adults only 18+.
